column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It's pretty good
column2: but I'm not sure I really get all the hype. Went there on Sunday morning - which I knew was a bad idea
column3: but wanted to get there before everything sells out. The line was already about ten people long. On the outside of the building... Took about an hour to order and receive food. Bought a fairly large selection of stuff
column4: as I don't plan on standing in that line very frequently. Everything was good
column5: so no complaints. Prices were.. Enough
